messages.content: Hi LUKA, I just bought a new Toyota Land Cruiser 300. Can you help me add it to my policy please?

Hey Nico! Congratulations on the new Land Cruiser - I saw it was voted Car Magazine’s SUV of the year, great choice. Check-out the review of your car by our friends at Cars.co.za - review I'd love to help you get it insured.

Let me pull up your account. I can see you currently have your Stellenbosch and Buffels Bay home insured with us. You have two existing vehicles covered, your 2020 Toyota Prado VX and your daughter’s 2022 VW Polo TSI Comfortline .

Your policy has been active since January 2023 and you've been claim-free for just over 26 months - excellent track record.

The current estimated value range determined with the help of our partners at We Buy Cars for your Prado is R750k - R825k, this means your insured value of R800k is right in the middle of this range. The Polo has a fair value estimate of R275k - R325, you have the car insured for R300k.

To get your Toyota Land Cruiser covered, I need a few details. What year, model and colour is it?
It's a white, 2026 Land Cruiser 300 VX. I paid R1.75 million for it.
Quick note, If its easier you are welcome to switch to whatsapp at any time during this conversation to use typing or voice notes.
All good to continue here, thanks.
Perfect. And you'll be parking at your Stellenbosch, De Zalze home, 30 Mouton Drive inside your garage?
Yes.

Great. By the way, I have already authenticated your policy using our voice based security authenticator. Based on the 2026 Land Cruiser 300 VX at R1.75 million, your indicative monthly premium would be around R2,340.

How do your premium stack up - Now here's the good part - I've analysed 1,347 home and car insurance quotes generated by Hippo.co.za in the past 30 days by customers with profiles similar to yours (Western Cape, 45-55 years old, three vehicles, two properties, claim-free history). I have also cross referenced your profile against similar profiles who submitted competitor policy schedules before joining LUKA over the past 120 days.

The average premium on a similar vehicle and profile returned is R2,691 - you are thus saving 15% on the industry average or R4,212 annually!
That sounds good. Thank you, Luka. One more question, what if my son drives the Land Cruiser from time to time? He just turned 18.

I remember when we added your daughter Jessica to your policy when she turned 18 - July 2023, right? Same situation with your son now? For occasional drivers under 25, you're covered as long as you remain the primary driver - meaning you use it more than 50% of the time. No additional premium. He just needs a valid license.
Great. Let's activate it.
Excellent! Processing now...
Thanks Luka, that was really easy.

My pleasure! One final thing, Nico. We have recently partnered with the Toyota dealership network. This allows you to book your Prado and your new Land Cruiser for services directly through Luka. So when it's time, just drop me a message and I will schedule it for you at a dealer of your choice.
I will keep that in mind, thank you!
LUKA!! Emergency - my geyser just burst at our De Zalze home in Stellenbosch! Water pouring through the kitchen ceiling! What do I do???

Nico, I'm on it - don't panic. First priority is safety. Have you turned off the main water supply and the geyser's power? This stops the flooding. Also let me know if you would like to move this chat to whatsapp if its easier.
Just did. Water off, power off. But the kitchen is a mess - ceiling sagging, floor flooded, water on my dining table. This is bad.
I hear you, this is stressful - but you've taken the right steps to contact me and think of safety first. That was quick thinking.
Do you have any other immediate concerns that I can address before we proceed to the next steps?
Nope, all sorted thanks.

Now let me help you get this fixed. I have opened your claim to start the process. First, let’s do an initial assessment. Are you able to assist with 4-5 photos? I need the burst geyser, the damaged ceiling, the flooded floor, and the wet dining table. Just add them to our current conversation or pop them into whatsapp to this number 07600000
Taking them now... Done. Just sent 6 photos.

Got them, analysing, give me a minute or two...

Okay, I see what we're dealing with. 150-liter geyser with ruptured tank - total loss. The ceiling has major water damage across 4 square meters. The floor is tiled, which is good - won't absorb water - but needs professional drying to prevent mold. The dining table has surface damage.

Here's my provisional assessment:
- Geyser replacement (unit + installation): [R7,800]
- Ceiling repair (drywall, paint, labor): [R4,200]
- Floor drying & mold prevention: [R2,100]
- Table refurbishment: [R1,800]
- Total: R15,900
Okay, thanks Luka. What happens now? How long does this take?

I'm approving this claim right now - no assessor needed. I have photos, including your 26-month claim-free history. This qualifies for instant approval.

**Claim #LUK-CLM-2024-NC-1850 - APPROVED**
Please confirm you are happy to use our suppliers? If you are using your own the above are the approved claim values.
Please proceed with your preferred suppliers Luka.
Awesome. We have checked Johan’s diary and he will be available at 10:45 am, will this work for you Nico?
That’s perfect, I am working from home today.

Great! Johan will contact you again 30min prior to confirm. Please see summary of the appointed service providers below.

✅ **Emergency plumber:** Johan from Stellenbosch Plumbing
- ETA: 10:45 AM (3 hours)
- Replacing geyser with new 150L unit
- He'll call 30 mins before

✅ **Restoration team:** DryTech Cape Winelands
- Monday 8:00 AM
- Ceiling repair, floor drying, mold prevention
- 1-2 days work

✅ **Furniture:** Sending you two, specialist antique refurbishment contacts - you choose, they bill us (up to R1,800)

Everything handled. No upfront payment - suppliers bill us directly.

This was incredibly quick, Luka. Thank you. Just one question, I am not sure if the table can be refurbished. Can we assess what the experts say when they see the table and then make a call to proceed or replace the table?
Of course we can. I just asked our claims team to inform the two suppliers to submit an assessment report to us when they visit your home. Let me handle this, I will keep you informed.
Okay, makes sense. So I just wait for Johan from Stellenbosch plumbing now?

Exactly. While you wait:

1. Open windows for air circulation
2. Move remaining electronics away from wet area
3. Put down towels if ceiling still dripping
4. Take a breath - the hard part is over

I'll check in at 2 PM after Johan finishes to make sure everything went smoothly. Then Sunday evening to confirm Monday's team timing.
Thanks LUKA. Honestly, I thought this would ruin my weekend. You've made this so much easier.
That's why I'm here. You focus on your weekend, I'll handle the insurance side. Talk at 2 PM.
